title: HearthCrawler Universal Patcher R28+ [arMa]
description:
Made another Universal Patcher for you guys hope you enjoy it.


Universal Patcher for version R28+

Ever thought about the guy who created SmartCC? He is now creating his own FREE (for now) bot and he will continue to deliver amazing products and features to the people of Hearthstone. Be sure to support and visit him at http://smartccbot.com

INSTRUCTIONS:
1) Place HearthPatcher.exe in the same dir as HearthCrawler.exe
2) Run it.
3) Click "Patch"
4) Open HearthCawler.exe

Pay us a visit at broad-product dot biz for more information
